jit-link|unresolved-symbol|runtime-api.rationale: Current nightly unresolved runtime ABI/symbol gaps.

runtime|unsupported-feature|general.rationale: General unsupported runtime bucket pending decomposition into focused child issues.

parse|unsupported-feature|general.rationale: LLVM IR parser feature coverage gaps.
